meta.title: Start your project
meta.description: Start your project with our configurator.

teaser.description: Choose the right configurator to start your project and get a first estimate.

fast.title: Fast
fast.description: Get a first estimate in just a few minutes.

transparent.title: Transparent
transparent.description: Full cost control and clear overview of services.

documentation.title: Documented
documentation.description: All steps and decisions are recorded.

cta.title: Ready?
cta.description: Choose your configurator now and get started!

wizardSelection.basicConfiguratorDescription: Quickly get an approximate price estimate. The Basic Configurator can serve as a first indicator and is done in 1 minute.
wizardSelection.advancedConfiguratorDescription: Capture your entire project in detail. Manage the result in your personal dashboard.

registrationPrompt.title: Please register
registrationPrompt.description1: Would you like to configure your project in detail and make it more concrete? To use the advanced wizard and save your project, please create an account.
registrationPrompt.description2: This will give you access to your personal dashboard, where you can manage multiple projects. Your email address is sufficient for registration.
